com.googlecode.jsonschema2pojo
Interface SchemaMapper

public interface SchemaMapper

Generates Java types from a JSON schema

Method Detail

generate

void generate(com.sun.codemodel.JCodeModel codeModel,
              java.lang.String className,
              java.lang.String packageName,
              java.io.InputStream schemaContent)
              throws java.io.IOException
Reads a schema and adds generated types to the given code model.

Parameters:
codeModel - the java code-generation context that should be used to generated new types
className - the name of the parent class the represented by this schema
packageName - the target package that should be used for generated types
schemaContent - the schema document content
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the schema content cannot be read
